title: Introduction to mixedLSR
text: Mixed, low-rank, sparse multivariate regression (mixedLSR) provides tools performing mixture regression coefficient matrix low-rank sparse. mixedLSR allows subgroup identification alternating optimization simulated annealing encourage global optimum convergence. method data-adaptive, automatically performing parameter selection identify low-rank substructures coefficient matrix.
code: library(mixedLSR) set.seed(1)

title: Introduction to mixedLSR
text: demonstrate mixedLSR, simulate heterogeneous population coefficient matrix low-rank sparse number coefficients estimate much larger sample size.
code: sim <- simulate_lsr(N = 100, k = 2, p = 30, m = 35)

title: Introduction to mixedLSR
text: , compute model. limit number iterations model can run.
code: model <- mixed_lsr(sim$x, sim$y, k = 2, alt_iter = 1, anneal_iter = 10, em_iter = 10, verbose = TRUE) #> mixedLSR Start: 1  #> Selecting Lambda.................................................. #> EM Step..... #> Simulated Annealing Step #> Full Cycle 1  #> Computing Final Model... #> Done!

title: Introduction to mixedLSR
text: Next, can evaluate clustering performance mixedLSR viewing cross-tabulation partition labels computing adjusted Rand index (ARI). case, mixedLSR perfectly clustered data.
code: table(sim$true, model$assign) #>     #>      1  2 #>   1 52  0 #>   2  0 48 ari <- mclust::adjustedRandIndex(sim$true, model$assign) print(paste("ARI:",ari)) #> [1] "ARI: 1"

title: Introduction to mixedLSR
text: Lastly, can view heatmap coefficient matrices compare true simulated matrices.   Reproducibility
code: plot_lsr(model$a) #> Warning: The `x` argument of `as_tibble.matrix()` must have unique column names if `.name_repair` is omitted as of tibble 2.0.0. #> Using compatibility `.name_repair`. title: Mixed, Low-Rank, and Sparse Multivariate Regression on High-Dimensional Data
text: Mixed, low-rank, sparse multivariate regression (mixedLSR) provides tools performing mixture regression coefficient matrix low-rank sparse. mixedLSR allows subgroup identification alternating optimization simulated annealing encourage global optimum convergence. method data-adaptive, automatically performing parameter selection identify low-rank substructures coefficient matrix.

title: Mixed, Low-Rank, and Sparse Multivariate Regression on High-Dimensional Data

what: Compute Bayesian information criterion for a mixedLSR model — bic_lsr
title: Compute Bayesian information criterion for a mixedLSR model — bic_lsr
text: Compute Bayesian information criterion mixedLSR model

title: Compute Bayesian information criterion for a mixedLSR model — bic_lsr
code: bic_lsr(a, n, llik)

title: Compute Bayesian information criterion for a mixedLSR model — bic_lsr
text: list coefficient matrices. n sample size. llik log-likelihood model.

title: Compute Bayesian information criterion for a mixedLSR model — bic_lsr
text: BIC.

title: Compute Bayesian information criterion for a mixedLSR model — bic_lsr
code: n <- 50 simulate <- simulate_lsr(n) model <- mixed_lsr(simulate$x, simulate$y, k = 2, init_lambda = c(1,1), alt_iter = 0) #> mixedLSR Start: 1  #> Computing Final Model... #> Done!  bic_lsr(model$A, n = n, model$llik) #> [1] 5512.432

title: Internal Alternating Optimization Function — fct_alt_optimize
text: Internal Alternating Optimization Function

title: Internal Alternating Optimization Function — fct_alt_optimize
code: fct_alt_optimize(   x,   y,   k,   clust_assign,   lambda,   alt_iter,   anneal_iter,   em_iter,   temp,   mu,   eps,   accept_prob,   sim_N,   verbose )

title: Internal Alternating Optimization Function — fct_alt_optimize
text: x matrix predictors. y matrix responses. k number groups. clust_assign current clustering assignment. lambda vector penalization parameters. alt_iter maximum number times alternate classification expectation maximization algorithm simulated annealing algorithm. anneal_iter maximum number simulated annealing iterations. em_iter maximum number EM iterations. temp initial simulated annealing temperature, temp > 0. mu simulated annealing decrease temperature fraction. best configuration improved, reduce temperature (mu)T, 0 < mu < 1. eps final simulated annealing temperature, eps > 0. accept_prob simulated annealing probability accepting new assignment 0 < accept_prob < 1. closer 1, trial assignments small perturbation current assignment. closer 0, trial assignments closer random. sim_N simulated annealing number iterations reaching equilibrium. verbose boolean indicating whether print screen.

title: Internal Alternating Optimization Function — fct_alt_optimize
text: final fit mixedLSR

what: Internal Double Penalized Projection Function — fct_dpp
title: Internal Double Penalized Projection Function — fct_dpp
text: Internal Double Penalized Projection Function

title: Internal Double Penalized Projection Function — fct_dpp
code: fct_dpp(   y,   x,   rank,   lambda = NULL,   alpha = 2 * sqrt(3),   beta = 1,   sigma,   ptype = "grLasso",   y_sparse = TRUE )

title: Internal Double Penalized Projection Function — fct_dpp
text: y matrix responses. x matrix predictors. rank rank, known. lambda vector penalization parameters. alpha positive constant DPP parameter. beta positive constant DPP parameter. sigma estimated standard deviation ptype group penalized regression penalty type. See grpreg. y_sparse Y coefficients treated sparse?

title: Internal Double Penalized Projection Function — fct_dpp
text: list containing estimated coefficients, covariance, penalty parameters.

title: Internal Simulated Annealing Function — fct_sim_anneal
text: x matrix predictors. y matrix responses. k number groups. init_assign initial clustering assignment. lambda vector penalization parameters. temp initial simulated annealing temperature, temp > 0. mu simulated annealing decrease temperature fraction. best configuration improved, reduce temperature (mu)T, 0 < mu < 1. eps final simulated annealing temperature, eps > 0. accept_prob simulated annealing probability accepting new assignment 0 < accept_prob < 1. closer 1, trial assignments small perturbation current assignment. closer 0, trial assignments closer random. sim_N simulated annealing number iterations reaching equilibrium. track likelihood tracking vector. anneal_iter maximum number simulated annealing iterations. verbose boolean indicating whether print screen.

title: Internal Simulated Annealing Function — fct_sim_anneal

what: Mixed Low-Rank and Sparse Multivariate Regression for High-Dimensional Data — mixed_lsr
title: Mixed Low-Rank and Sparse Multivariate Regression for High-Dimensional Data — mixed_lsr
text: Mixed Low-Rank Sparse Multivariate Regression High-Dimensional Data

title: Mixed Low-Rank and Sparse Multivariate Regression for High-Dimensional Data — mixed_lsr
code: mixed_lsr(   x,   y,   k,   nstart = 1,   init_assign = NULL,   init_lambda = NULL,   alt_iter = 5,   anneal_iter = 1000,   em_iter = 1000,   temp = 1000,   mu = 0.95,   eps = 1e-06,   accept_prob = 0.95,   sim_N = 200,   verbose = TRUE )

title: Mixed Low-Rank and Sparse Multivariate Regression for High-Dimensional Data — mixed_lsr
text: x matrix predictors. y matrix responses. k number groups. nstart number random initializations, result maximum likelihood returned. init_assign vector initial assignments, NULL default. init_lambda vector values initialize penalization parameter group, e.g., c(1,1,1). Set NULL default. alt_iter maximum number times alternate classification expectation maximization algorithm simulated annealing algorithm. anneal_iter maximum number simulated annealing iterations. em_iter maximum number EM iterations. temp initial simulated annealing temperature, temp > 0. mu simulated annealing decrease temperature fraction. best configuration improved, reduce temperature (mu)T, 0 < mu < 1. eps final simulated annealing temperature, eps > 0. accept_prob simulated annealing probability accepting new assignment 0 < accept_prob < 1. closer 1, trial assignments small perturbation current assignment. closer 0, trial assignments closer random. sim_N simulated annealing number iterations reaching equilibrium. verbose boolean indicating whether print screen.

title: Mixed Low-Rank and Sparse Multivariate Regression for High-Dimensional Data — mixed_lsr
text: list containing likelihood, partition, coefficient matrices, BIC.

title: Mixed Low-Rank and Sparse Multivariate Regression for High-Dimensional Data — mixed_lsr

what: Simulate Heterogeneous, Low-Rank, and Sparse Data — simulate_lsr
title: Simulate Heterogeneous, Low-Rank, and Sparse Data — simulate_lsr
text: Simulate Heterogeneous, Low-Rank, Sparse Data

title: Simulate Heterogeneous, Low-Rank, and Sparse Data — simulate_lsr
code: simulate_lsr(   N = 100,   k = 2,   p = 30,   m = 35,   b = 1,   d = 20,   h = 0.2,   case = "independent" )

title: Simulate Heterogeneous, Low-Rank, and Sparse Data — simulate_lsr
text: N sample size, default = 100. k number groups, default = 2. p number predictor features, default = 30. m number response features, default = 35. b signal--noise ratio, default = 1. d singular value, default = 20. h lower bound singular matrix simulation, default = 0.2. case covariance case, "independent" "dependent", default = "independent".

title: Simulate Heterogeneous, Low-Rank, and Sparse Data — simulate_lsr
text: list simulation values, including x matrix, y matrix, coefficients true clustering assignments.

title: Simulate Heterogeneous, Low-Rank, and Sparse Data — simulate_lsr
